title: 2017 Research Shows Every Human Vaccine Is Contaminated With Inorganic Chemical Compounds - 44 Vaccines Tested
cleaned_text:
Do you ever wonder what else is in vaccines?

We already know there is a vast array of poisonous chemicals in those vaccine shots, but did you know that they all have inorganic chemical compounds in them too?

There were 44 vaccines tested in this research, and 1 veterinary vaccine. Weirdly, the vaccine for your cat doesn’t have any highly toxic inorganic compounds, just all the human ones.

Recently released in January 2017, this new research paper is called ‘New Quality-Control Investigations on Vaccines: Micro and Nanocontamination’ In this research, 44 vaccines from Italy and France were analysed “…to detect the possible presence of inorganic, particulate contaminants and identify their chemical composition.”

What they found was that EVERY SINGLE HUMAN VACCINE HAD INORGANIC COMPOUNDS IN THEM! These compounds are NOT listed in the ingredients.

What Were Those Inorganic Compounds?

Let’s check out just one of the vaccines that was tested, and bear in mind, nearly all these vaccines were found to have a long chain of these inorganic compounds.

W – Tungsten – is used as filaments in incandescent light bulbs, electric contacts and arc-welding electrodes.

CaAlSi – Calcium aluminium silicate – is an anti caking agent and Insoluble in water and ethanol.

Al – Aluminium – proven many times over to be a neurological toxin.

CaSiAlFe – I ran this through chemical compound formula decoders and it couldn’t compute this one. The only mention I can find of this compound on the internet is in relation to a cement oxide compound. Which, “…when water is added, it produces a cement paste” The only other mention of this is in a document called ‘Accident Bulletin, Issues 87-98. United States. Federal Railroad Administration. Office of Safety 1923’ that is not able to be accessed.

FeS – Iron(II) Sulfide – “Iron sulphide combined together with ferrous silicon and ferromanganese is used to increase the sulphur content of steel and iron. Iron sulphide is also used as a laboratory chemical for the preparation of hydrogen sulphide gas. In hair dyes, paint, ceramics, bottles and glasses, iron sulphide is used as a pigment.”

FeCr – Iron chromium – another inorganic compound that doesn’t belong in a human being.

FeCrNi – Iron chromium nickel – is part of a group of metal alloys that were developed to be heat resistant.

Fe – Iron – in large amounts can damage internal organs resulting in metabolic acidosis, which then damages internal organs.

FeTiMn – another chemical composition that has not a lot of mentions on the internet, however, I did find “FeTiMn alloy granulate in a pressure container for storage of hydrogen and deuterium”

Ba – “Barium is chemically similar to magnesium, calcium, and strontium, but even more reactive. It always exhibits the oxidation state of +2”

SiMgAlFe – is an alloy for deoxidizing molten steel.

All that in just one of the vaccines tested! It seems unbelievable that this is correct. However, if you follow the links in the research section below, you will see what I’m telling you is 100% true. In fact, it’s even worse than what can be stated in just one article.

Other Particles Were Found To Contain:

“The investigations revealed that some particles are embedded in a biological substrate, probably proteins, endo-toxins and residues of bacteria. As soon as a particle comes in contact with proteic fluids, a nano-bio-interaction occurs and a “protein corona” is formed. The nano-bio-interaction generates a bigger sized compound that is not biodegradable and can induce adverse effects, since it is not recognized by the body as something natural.

Similar aggregates, though in different situations (patients suffering from leukemia or cryoglobulinemia), have already been described in literature. The link between these two entities generates an unfolding of the proteins that can induce an autoimmune effect once those proteins are injected into humans. ”

Protect Yourself And Your Family

Good parenting and your child’s protection begins with their health. Get it right, and you have a happy, healthy child that has every chance of living the life of their dreams. Get it wrong and you could end up with a life time of regret.

I know there is a lot of coercion by governments to get vaccinated, and they’ve made that a social ‘norm’ However, we are talking about Inorganic compounds being injected into your child’s body. You need to, at the very least, be asking questions!

So please, I beg you, start asking questions. Get satisfactory answers and if it feels like the wrong thing to do, then DON’T DO IT!
